comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on July 14, 2023, 01:28:09 AMI got this message on Kucoin actually I want to know if it will really give me 10 free spain if I invite friends? Here they say more: INVITE FRIENDS TO PARTICIPATE IN THE LUCKY DRAW AND WIN AN MACBOOK PRO 16"I would like to know the details about it if anyone kindly explain me too?Can I get it full assurance from this?It's just a normal scheme, most platforms use to get new customers. It's a referral program and I don't think you would get a chance with any of their listed prizes. Usually they will give you the free spins, but it's almost a waste if your time since it has already been programmed to end at the [try again]  You can try it just for fun, but don't anticipate too much on any prize you won't win.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: The exchange is called Kucoin, not Kukoin.If it has terms and conditions, I will advice you to read about the T&C.If you want to earn from referred program, the best is to refer and know the reward you will receive from each person that you refer and if you have many people to refer, you may earn more than the money for MacBook Pro which likely you may not even win at all in the spins. Would the 10 free spin be given for each person that you refer? That would be included in the T&C.All I can say is that you should try your luck and I do not think this kind of thread is needed to be created. It is just a spin that can increase your referral reward or reduce it to zero USDT just like gambling.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: KuCoin is using this strategy to get more users.They are into such promo stuff; sometimes they will ask for surveys from users, promising to pay them after the survey, but it always ends up in a few people’s hands, and I haven't heard that one person won any of this promo, which makes me feel like doing it now is a waste of time.Although if OP will be able to refer people after carefully going through the rules guiding the promo contest by making sure anyone that was being referred wasn’t using KuCoin before now and had deposited a minimum of $50, according to their new policy, the user must have passed KYC and then deposit the money before you will be provided with the five free spins.
